activities: Accountholders' Personally Identifiable Information and email address is used only for demographic statistics, to display appropriate individualized advertisements, process credit card payments and purchase domain names. Mail2World keeps all of Personally Identifiable Information and email addresses private, sharing that information only as necessary with the following third parties: 1) LinkPoint International (limited to credit card authentication and processing when you purchase premium or value-added email services), P.O. Box 2048, Simi Valley, CA 93062 USA, phone: (888) 477-3611, email support@linkpoint.com, and 2) eNom, Inc. (limited to registering your email domain names), 2002 156th Ave. NE, Suite #300, Unigard Park, McKinley Building, Bellevue, WA 98007 USA, phone: 425.274.4500, email info@enom.com. Except for the third-party organizations listed here, Mail2World will not disclose Personally Identifiable Information or email address unless acting under a good faith belief that such action is necessary to: (1) conform to legal requirements or comply with legal process; (2) protect and defend the rights or property of Mail2World; (3) enforce the Mail2World Terms of Service; or (4) act to protect the interests of its members or others. We reserve the right to disclose your personally identifiable information as required by law and when we believe that disclosure is necessary to protect our rights and/or comply with a judicial proceeding, court order, or legal process served on our Web site.
